Package ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Listener
    Listener interface, listeners will be placed in views and passed to model objects to allow the model to call update in the listener, the listener then updates the necessary elements of the views in the update method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApproverClaimInfo
    Activity displaying a claim for an approver, approvers get this view instead of EditClaimActivity since they can't edit a claim but may need to view all the info available in the EditClaimActivity.
    ApproverClaimsListActivity
    Displays a list of submitted claims for the approver and allows them to click individual claims to view the contained expenses.
    ApproverExpenseListActivity
    Allows the approver to view the expenses contained in a clicked claim and provides the option to approve, return or comment on the claim via buttons on the bottom.
    Claim
    Model of a Claim used to edit a list of expenses, claimant name, start and end date, destination & reason list, Tag list for the claim, completeness, list of approvers for the claim, a list of comments, listeners for the views that will use this model, and the status
    ClaimantClaimsListActivity
    Displays the claimant's list of claims and allows them to be clicked to view the underlying expenses.
    ClaimantCommentActivity
    The view for viewing comments attached to claims as a claimant
    ClaimantExpenseListActivity
    View for showing the expense items of a chosen claim Allows navigation to add/edit expense items Allows claimants to submit claims, as well as view comments from approvers
    ClaimList
    Implements a list of claims along along with a set of listeners to be updated whenever the list is modified.
    ClaimListController
    The controller allowing modifications from the ui to change the claims and claims lists Allows general functionality like adding/deleting claims
    ClaimListManager  
    EditClaimActivity
    View for adding/editing claims Provides UI for entering claim information
    EditExpenseActivity
    View for adding/editing an Expense item.
    Expense
    Implements the model of an Expense item which is an individual part of a specific claim and contains a date, category, description, cost, currency, receipt photo and whether the expense is flagged or incomplete.
    ExpenseList
    Stores a list of Expenses along with a set of listeners to be updated whenever the list is modified.
    ExpenseListController
    Controller for all ExpenseLists, The contained ExpenseList will be automatically linked when expenses are being accessed.
    LoginActivity
    Activity providing login screen where user can enter a user name for them self and then choose to enter either the claimant or approver mode of the application.
    MultiSelectionSpinner
    Implements a "MultiSelectionSpinner", when clicked it presents a dialog allowing for selection of a subset of items from a list using checkboxes.
    Tag
    Implements the Tags which will be added to Claims in order to provide a way of filtering specific types of Claim.
    TagList
    Stores a list of tags (as an ArrayList) along with a set of listeners to be updated whenever the list is modified.
    TagListController
    Controller for TagList, uses lazy singleton design pattern.
    TagListManager
    Will provide an interface to save the associated TagList to the disk and when possible to the web server (not yet implemented).
    TagManagerActivity
    View for managing the application's list of tags.
    User
    Class representing a user that can add and approve claims, has a name and a type which should be either claimant or approver
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Claim.Status
    enum class Status public to access values of enum
